headline: Your Story Deserves
Exceptional Artistry
hero.subheadline: Transform your vision into stunning custom tattoo art with precision, creativity, and uncompromising quality.
hero.urgencyText: Limited appointments available - book your consultation today
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist at work creating custom design

portfolio.subtitle: Every piece tells a story. Every story deserves exceptional artistry.

sessions.subtitle: Professional service packages designed around your vision and timeline.
sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guarantee on all custom work

testimonials.quote: Absolutely incredible work! Alex took my rough idea and created something beyond my wildest dreams. The attention to detail and professionalism is unmatched.
testimonials.author: Sarah M.

testimonials.quote: The studio atmosphere is perfect - clean, professional, and welcoming. My tattoo healed beautifully and looks exactly as envisioned. Highly recommend!
testimonials.author: James R.

paragraphs: With over 8 years of experience in the tattoo industry, Alex Stone has built a reputation for creating truly exceptional custom artwork. Specializing in detailed, story-driven pieces, Alex combines technical precision with artistic vision to bring each client's unique story to life.

At Tattoo 13, we believe every tattoo should be as individual as the person wearing it. That's why we never use flash designs - every piece is custom-created from scratch, ensuring your tattoo is completely unique and perfectly suited to you.
about.callout: Your vision, our artistry - creating tattoos that stand the test of time.
about.imageAlt: Alex Stone, professional tattoo artist at Tattoo 13

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 2-4 weeks in advance for tattoo sessions. Consultation appointments are typically available within a week. Popular time slots fill up quickly, so early booking is advised.

items.question: What's included in the aftercare?
items.answer: Every tattoo session includes a comprehensive aftercare package with healing balm, detailed instructions, and follow-up support. We're available for any questions during your healing process.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Create Your Masterpiece?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your consultation today and take the first step towards your perfect custom tattoo.

booking.modalDescription: Ready to start your tattoo journey? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.successMessage: Thank you for your booking request. We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment and discuss your tattoo ideas.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment.
